content: 6 and work one more repeat of row 5 and 6 before beginning the border border chain 1 turn single_crochet in first double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet *half_double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch in top of double_crochet just made double_crochet in next double_crochet half_double_crochet in next double_crochet sc3toc* repeat from * to * until center chain 2 space ending with decrease in last 2 double_crochet before center space half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet chain 5 slip_stitch in treble_crochet just made double_crochet half_double_crochet in center chain 2 space decrease repeat from * to * until the end of the row ending with 1 single_crochet in each of last 2 double_crochet i would love to see pictures of your creations feel free to share photos on our facebook page at http //www facebook com/littlemonkeysstitchnspin or ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/little-monkeys-stitch-n-spin you may sell finished items from this pattern please include a link to our website at www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com on any listings copyright 2011 by dena stelly copyright 2011 by dena stelly
